## Welcome! 
I am a **Senior Associate** in [Antitrust and Competition Practice](https://www.crai.com/services/antitrust-and-competition/) at  [Charles River Associates](https://www.crai.com/).

My fields of interest include **Industrial Organization**, **Applied Microeconomics**, and **Applied Econometrics**.
